attributes.action: Make travel cheaper for workers who are travelling to work all year by public transport and not using cars to clogg up roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it cheaper for commuters who travel all year to and from the workplace.

This would  lead to a reduction in the clogging up the road network in peak hours. Such as cheaper all round year 'zone cards' that can be used on all all Public transport systems: eg buses, trains,underground etc.
